properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Tipton, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 7:26PM CST until March 2 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Osceola
* until Sunday March 1.
* At 7 PM Wednesday the stage was 28.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.5 feet on Friday February 21.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Wednesday February 12 and will
continue rising to near 34.5 feet by Friday February 21.
* At 35.0 feet...In Tennessee, Highway 19 West is flooded at many
places betweem Ashport and Goldust halting evcuations southwest of
Ashport. Home sites on Henderson Shop Road are being covered. T.
Rossinger Road is beginning to flood. Home sites between Crawford
Road and Cold Creek are flooding. In Arkansas, terminal elevator on
Sans Souci Road is being flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
